EmailTemplate.subject: Understanding Work Permit Teachers Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Morning/Afternoon,
We're offering all our schools the opportunity to join our FREE interactive webinar on Understanding Work Permit Teachers: A Guide for UK Schools. To register your schools interest, simply click here to register for the webinar. Interested in hiring overseas teachers for your school? Want to understand more about the process of hiring Work Permit Teacher?
Delivered by our experienced International team, the following information will be covered in this FREE webinar:
Find out how your school / Academy / LEA applies for the Sponsorship Licence. Discover how the process works, including Labour Market testing. Information on applying for the Certificate of Sponsorship. The cost to your school. The benefits of hiring a Work Permit candidate, in particular retention in Core Subjects. Delivered by our experienced International team with a proven track record in placing Tier 2 candidates, including Maths, Science & other non-shortage subjects.
Sign your school up today! Click here to find more out more information on our website and register your interest.
Kind Regards,
Supply Desk
